comments:
I have found that when updating a project that contains thousands of files if one of the files is out of synch then after 10 minutes of receiving files - as seen in the cvs progress - I will get the following error and none of the files that has been received will appear.  The update process should deal with this in a more forgivable manner.

Unfortunately, we wont have the time during 3.3 to address this issue. Here is a FAQ entry that describes how to revert to the pre-3.2 behavior.

http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/CVS_FAQ#Synchronizing_has_some_regressions_in_Eclipse_3.2._Why.3F
